name: Dark Cloud 2
description:
In the future, an evil emperor begins a journey
back through time to eliminate a growling threat to his dominance

IN THE PRESENT, a world is dying - only a single secluded town remains. But in this town a carefree young man discovers a secret that affects the course of history and changes his life forever...

*    More than an RPG - combines action adventure, role play, landscape sim elements and an epic plot with endless opportunities for fun and creativity

*    Over 100 total hours of engaging gameplay - explore dungeons, invent gadgets, defeat hundreds of monsters in 'real time' battle and enjoy entertaining mini games

*    Build detailed villages and towns using the enhanced Georama feature

*    Switch between two playable characters, each with individual abilities, multiple attack forms, special moves and upgradeable weaponry
